STATEMENT OP THE AUDITOR Of PUBLIC ACCOUNTS.
STATE OF NEBRASKA, 1 Office of Auditor of Public Accounts. /
It is hereby certified that the foregoing are true statements of the appropriations made and the money expended by the 28th Session of the Legislature of the State of Nebraska, up to and including the 23d of May, 1908, specifying the amount of each item, and to whom and for what paid, as provided by Section 22, Article 3, of the Constitution.
In testimony whereof, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my official seal this 3d day of June, 1903.
CHARLES WESTON,
[seal.] Auditor of Public Accounts.
